aka: Little Red Riding Hood: A Tale of Blood and Death
this_title: Rotkäppchen: Eine Erzählung von Blut und Tod
trans_title: Little Red Riding Hood: A Tale of Blood and Death
introduction: When Markus sees a girl in front of his house and brings her, his partner, Annika, is not comfortable about it. The girl knows details about the couple and begins a mind game that goes far beyond rationality.
chinese_title: Rotkäppchen: Eine Erzählung von Blut und Tod
